rows.label: tlk43500142_01_msg0001
rows.name:
What do you want, young'un?
I'm done with my mercenary
consultation sessions for today.

rows.label: tlk43500142_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, you're not mercenaries?
Sorry, then. Guess I got the wrong idea.

rows.label: tlk43500142_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I'd still be glad to lend you a
word of advice if there's anything
troubling you, mind.

rows.label: tlk43500142_01_msg0004
rows.name:
I used to be the leader of a mercenary
band, y'see, so I know a thing or two.

rows.label: tlk43500142_01_msg0101
rows.name:
Well, if it isn't Vandham. I've heard
all sorts of tales about the things
you've been getting up to.

rows.label: tlk43500142_01_msg0102
rows.name:
In all my years, I never heard of a
mercenary band taking in orphans
from across the land until yours!

rows.label: tlk43500142_01_msg0103
rows.name:
From the looks of things, I'll wager
you're sticking your nose in to help
another band of youths right now, eh?

rows.label: tlk43500142_01_msg0104
rows.name:
Well, I'm not going to stop you,
but try to look out for yourself too
once in a while.
